example.eg: Take your umbrella in case it rains.
example.egtrans: 拿上你的雨伞，以防下雨。

example.eg: Take your umbrella with you in case of rain.
In case of emergency, walk in an orderly fashion to the assembly point.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如果发生, 倘若, 万一

example.eg: You should take an umbrella just in case it rains.
example.egtrans: 你应该带把伞，以防万一。

example.eg: They may ask for some kind of ID, so take your passport just in case.
example.egtrans: 他们可能会要求出示身份证明，所以最好带上你的护照以防万一。
